Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by New York (A) in 2007...
Injured on 5/27/2008 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/17/2011...
Traded from New York (A) to San Diego on 5/23/2011 (Going to NYA: RF D. Vettleson, P J. Odorizzi. Going to SDN: P R. Porcello, P H. Brown, 2B M. Quintana)...
Had first career hit on 6/17/2011, off Jeff Gray (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/30/2011, off Luke Prokopec (COL)...
Won World Championship with San Diego in 2014...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/18/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
